roleset.name: to urge on, metaphorically or literally poking
roleset.note: PROD-V NOTES: VN classes force-59, touch-20-1. (from prod.01-v)

example.name: all arguments
example.text: The Sept. 30 end of the federal fiscal year may have prodded contractors to get any behind-schedule road and bridge construction under way `` before the clock ran out , '' Mr. Christie said [0] [*T*-1], [*-2] referring to threatened 5 % across-the-board budget cuts .
example.arg: The Sept. 30 end of the federal fiscal year
to get any behind-schedule road and bridge construction under way `` before the clock ran out

example.name: prepositional Arg2
example.text: Still , he says [0] [*T*-1], `` it 's no bad thing '' if all the marketing prods people into [*-2] putting aside a little more .
example.arg: into [*-2] putting aside a little more
